House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi , D-Calif., who stood by Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital bed when her left eye fluttered open. Her right eye was damaged and is still bandaged. Kirsten Gillibrand said the congresswomen were telling Gabrielle Giffords how proud we were of her and how she was inspiring the whole nation with her courage and with her strength. And then Debbie Wasserman Schultz and I started joking about all the things we were going to do after she got better. to have plenty of laughs at Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell 's expense but now they've been replaced with Michael McIntyre and David Hasselhoff . Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better. ''Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking.
